<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Dictionary Upgrade (May 2022 Release)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryArr = [{
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_sourcing_activity^element=sourcing_close_date',
        'attribute': {
            'mandatory': false
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_negotiation^element=supplier',
        'attribute': {
            'reference_qual': 'javascript: Negotiation.getSuppliersReferenceQualifier()'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'nameSTARTSWITHsn_shop_purchase_requisition^element=merge_candidate',
        'attribute': {
            'mandatory': false
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_line^element=sourcing_activity',
        'attribute': {
            'attributes': 'encode_utf8=false,readonly_clickthrough=true',
            'read_only': true
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_line^element=negotiation',
        'attribute': {
            'attributes': 'encode_utf8=false,readonly_clickthrough=true',
            'read_only': true
        }
    }
];

var choiceArr = [{
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_negotiation^element=state^value=50',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Closed Decided'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=subtype^value=info_needed^name=sn_shop_sourcing_task',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Ask a question'
        }
    }
];

var docArr = [{
    'query': 'element=merge_candidate^name=sn_shop_purchase_requisition',
    'attribute': {
        'label': 'Can be merged',
        'plural': 'Can be merged'
    }
}];

// Update Documentation Elements
docArr.forEach(updateDocumentation);
dictionaryArr.forEach(updateDictionary);
choiceArr.forEach(updateChoice);

function updateDictionary(obj) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    while (dictionaryGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(dictionaryGr, obj.attribute);
}

function updateChoice(choiceObj) {
    var choiceGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
    choiceGr.addEncodedQuery(choiceObj.query);
    choiceGr.query();
    while (choiceGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(choiceGr, choiceObj.attribute);
}

function updateDocumentation(docObj) {
    var documenationGr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
    documenationGr.addEncodedQuery(docObj.query);
    documenationGr.query();
    while (documenationGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(documenationGr, docObj.attribute);
}]]></script>
